title: Keep Smiling! (2004) DVDRip
description:
Keep Smiling!

Latvia 2004
Length: 79:00 minutes
Language: latvian
Subtitles: english, russian, latvian
 
Director: Askolds Saulitis
Screenplay: Askolds Saulitis, Viktors Duks

This is a film about four men who are looking for missing soldiers. What is dragging 30 years old great friends to long forgotten war fields? To give an answer to this question would be to find the meaning of life. With sincere emotional touch the film is following the way of an unknown soldier back to his family and motherland after more than half a century.The events in the film take place at the same time as the second war in Iraq continues.
